price: (14) And [even] if We opened to them a gate from the heaven and they continued therein to ascend,
arabic: وَلَوۡ فَتَحۡنَا عَلَيۡهِم بَابٗا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَظَلُّواْ فِيهِ يَعۡرُجُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: walaw fataḥnā ʿalayhim bāban mina al-samāi faẓallū fīhi yaʿrujūna
